overview: They were the most exciting tag team of the 1980s. Dynamite Kid was the revolutionary high flyer of the group. His cousin, Davey Boy Smith, was the powerhouse. Together they thrilled fans all over the world. This DVD chronicals their greatest bouts as a duo against the superstars of Japan. Also included is a bonus match as the cousins do battle against each other!
title: British Bulldogs in Japan
